title: Kuzhazhoothum Kannanukku Lyrics Mella Thiranthathu Kathavu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kulal Oothum Kannanukku
kuyil paadum
pattu ketkudhaa
kukkoo kukkoo kukkoo

elaiyodu poovum
thalaiyattum paaru
elaiyodu poovum
kayum thalaiyattum
paaru paaru

Kulal Oothum Kannanukku
kuyil paadum
pattu ketkudhaa
kukkoo kukkoo kukkoo

mala kaathu veesurapodhu
malligapoo paadaathaa
mala megam koodurapodhu
vanna mayil aadadhaa

enmaeni theanerumbu
emmpaattu poongarumbu
machaan naan
metteduthen
unna thaan katti vaippen

sugamaga thaalam thatti
paadattumaa
unakkaachu enakkaachu
sari jodi naamaachu
kelaiyyaa..

kanna un valiba nenja
empaattu usuppuradha
karkandu sarkarai
ellaam ippathaan
kasakkuradha

vandhaachu chithira thaan
poyaachu niththira thaan
poovaana ponnukuththaan
raavaana vedhanaithaan

medhuvaaga thoodhu solli
paadattumaa
vilakeththum poludhaana
ila nenjam padum paadu
kelaiyyaa

Kulal Oothum Kannanukku
kuyil paadum
pattu ketkudhaa
kukkoo kukkoo kukkoo

elaiyodu poovum
thalaiyattum paaru
elaiyodu poovum
kayum thalaiyattum
paaru paaru
